name: Main Building
description: The main entrance to the Edge Hill campus, the main building is also an accommodation option which recently had a refurbishment in 2022.

name: Edge link
description: The EL1 bus regulary runs between the Edge Hill campus and the bus station in town. The service is free when your Unicard is presented.

name: Catalyst
description: Open 24/7, the catalyst not only acts as a library with quiet study spaces but also has support for any career queries and help with student services.

name: Creative Edge
description: The Creative Edge is a state-of-the-art building providing high-spec suites of industry-standard facilities for media, film, animation and advertising students.

name: Beach
description: Edge Hill's very own beach located within Chancellor's court.

name: Sports Centre
description: The Sports Centre features an 80-station fitness suite, aerobics studio, 25-metre swimming pool, health suite and a Café/lounge area.

name: Sports Pitches
description: Edge Hill has a 3G football/ rugby pitch, 3G football courts, a hockey pitch, grass pitches, an atheltics track and tennis/ netball courts.

name: Durning Centre
description: The Durning Centre houses facilities management providing hard, soft and commerical FM services to all students.

name: Post room
description: Students living on campus can collect their post on weekdays. Post will be held for a maximum of four weeks.

name: The Hub
description: The hub is located in the centre of campus, it provides shops like morrisons and many different options for food, along with much more.

name: Wilson Centre
description: The Wilson Centre is home to a wide range of classrooms, as well as performance, sleep, biochemistry and psychology labs and functional rehab and kinesiology facilities.

name: Business School
description: The Business School works with key national, regional and local employers and businesses as well as major professional bodies across its degree subjects

name: Law and Psychology
description: A language laboratory and specialist experimental facilities for psychological research form part of the £6 million Law and Psychology building.

name: Geosciences
description: GeoSciences houses industry-standard laboratories, purpose-built for physical geography and geo-technical engineering.

name: Biosciences
description: BioSciences is home to modern laboratories, climate controlled insectaries, specialist IT facilities and state-of-the-art scientific equipment.

name: Tech Hub
description: The £13 million Technology Hub houses a microbiology suite and the CAVE (Computer Augmented Virtual Environment), the UK’s first super immersive 3D virtual environment.

name: Clinical skills/ Simulation Centre
description: A new clinical skills and simulation centre provides innovative facilities that replicate real-world health, social care and medicine environments.

name: Education Building Piazza
description: The Faculty of Education has a well-established national reputation for the delivery of high-quality Initial Teacher Training (ITT) across the full range of age phases.

name: Ducks!
description: Part of the wildlife on campus, the ducks/ ducklings can always be seen by the education lake.

name: Campus Cat
description: Part of the wildlife on campus, the campus cat is usually seen either walking around campus or lazing about acting as a comfort for students.

name: Education Building Lakeside
description: The Faculty of Education has a well-established national reputation for the delivery of high-quality Initial Teacher Training (ITT) across the full range of age phases.

name: Health/ social care/ medicine
description: The Faculty of Health, Social Care and Medicine is housed in a £14 million purpose-built building with some of the best facilities for health and social care students in the country.

name: Arts Centre
description: Discover entertainment in The Studio Theatre and Rose Theatre, as well as a variety of suites and recital spaces purpose-built for the creative arts.

name: Bunnies
description: Part of the wildlife on campus, the bunnies can often be found near the founders west accommodation.

name: Main Building
description: The main entrance to the Edge Hill campus, the main building is also an accommodation option which recently had a refurbishment in 2022.
